name: Sunshiny Day Dress....Great for Back to School
description:
Adorable and full of ruffles.  This dress screams back to school!  Dress features tons of ruffles.  Perfect for your little twirler.  Over 3 yards of fabric in this dress (hence the price).  Pure cuteness!!!

Feel free to send me a message if you'd like a ruffle skirt or another style.  Happy to make any changes.  

Sizing:
18 months to 5T

6-8 available for an additional $5.

name: Light Pink Babydoll Lap Dress...More Colors Available Too
description:
How sweet is this dress.  Great for Spring and Summer.  Short shirred sleeves.  Made from amazing quality knit fabric.  Super soft.  She will want one in every color.  

More colors are available.  If you would like other colors, please email me at delaneysden@hotmail.com and I will set up a custom listing for you.

Sizing:
12 Months (Shoulder to hem - 16"  Chest - 10-10.5")
18 Months (Shoulder to hem - 19-9.5"  Chest - 10.5-11")
2 (Shoulder to hem - 21"  Chest - 12-12.5")
4 (Shoulder to hem - 23"  Chest - 13-14")
6 (Shoulder to hem - 25"  Chest - 14-15")
8 (Shoulder to hem - 28"  Chest - 15.5-16")

These run big.  I do not recommend sizing up.  If you want it more like a tunic or top, size down.  

My daughter is 4.5 years old and is 44" tall.  She is wearing a size 4.

More Colors Available:

Apple Green (All Sizes Available)
Black(All Sizes Available)
Brown (All Sizes Available)
Hot Pink (All Sizes Available)
White (All Sizes Available)
Yellow (Only available in  2, 4, 6, and 8-other sizes are backordered)
Turquoise (Backordered)
Lavender (Backordered)
Purple (Available in most sizes except 4)
Red (All Sizes available)
Sky Blue (All Sizes Available)


PLEASE ALLOW 3-4 WEEKS FOR DELIVERY (MORE THAN LIKELY SOONER)

name: Dress Up Days....Knot Top....Or Choose Your Own Version
description:
I adore this fabric. Perfect for 4th of July, but yet wearable all summer.  

You can choose to have this top as is or make it a flutter dress or a halter top.  

Flutter Dress is $44. Invoice will be sent if flutter style is requested. Halter and Knot Top is same price.  Just be sure to state which style you'd like.  If no style is listed, a knot top will be made.

Looks amazing with my navy ruffle shorties.

Sizing: 
6-12 months 
12-18 months 
18-24 months 
2T 
3T 
4T 
5T

Sizes 6-8 also available for an additional $5. Invoice will be sent via paypal.

options.name: Knot Top or Halter Top Version (Please State Size in PayPal Notes)

name: Ruffle Shorties......A Must Have this Summer!!!!
description:
Wow, do I love these.  Shorties are perfect for summer and why not have some ruffles to make her stand out!!!!  We will be wearing these everyday.

Shorties are available in various colors.  Some colors are limited, so grab them quick.

Shorties are made with cotton/lycra fabric (different fabric than last year, less pilling and fray and lighter weight).  These run tts, not small like leggings. Do not size up.   Shorties are made to high at knee.


Sizing: 
6-12 months ...Inseam 3.5 inches
12-18 months ...Inseam 3.75 inches
18-24 months ...Inseam 4 inches
2T ...Inseam 4.25 inches
3T ...Inseam 4.5 inches
4T ...Inseam 5 inches
5T ...Inseam 5.5 inches
6 ...Inseam 6 inches
7 ...Inseam 7 inches
8...Inseam 8 inches

Colors Available:

White
Off White

(IF YOU NEED ANOTHER COLOR, STATE IN PAYPAL AND I'LL SEE WHAT I CAN DO.)

name: Applique Tank or Tee...You Choose Applique
description:
Adorable appliqued tank or tee.  These are MONAG tanks and tees, but if you prefer Old Navy, just leave me a note. MONAG only comes in even sizes (2, 4, 6, 8).

They run tts.  My daughter is a 4.5 and we are wearing a size 4 this summer.

I can also get Old Navy tanks.  They come in other colors.  If you are needing a colored tank, just email me to check for availability.  

Choose from the following appliques:

(see facebook for examples)

bird
flower (many types)
owl
bib 
child's initial
ruffle neck 
bird on a branch
elephant

If you'd like a specific applique, just email me.  I am happy to make it special for your little lady.

options.name: OLD NAVY TANK (STATE SIZE IN PAYPAL NOTES)
Gap (cream color or other color offered on their site)
